ingredient-information.sestavine: Aqua, Glycerin, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Pentylene Glycol, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Bisabolol, Allantoin, Sodium Lactate, Sodium PCA, Glycine, Fructose, Urea, Niacinamide, Inositol, Trehalose, Serine, Algin, Glyceryl Polyacrylate, Caprylyl Glycol, Pollulan, Disodium Phosphate, Potassium Phosphate, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Lactic Acid, Citric Acid, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin.
